Posts.EditableText: Thank You Alex for making my deprogramming of the alpha-numerical nature of lotteries easier.  I have used Quest to create a program that equates numbers to letters in a certain fashion, and this will speed up my progress and reduce my work time by diminshing human error.  If I benefit from this study, you will too.  Thanks again.
